AddLiquidityTraderJoeV2(address,address,.details: emitted after adding liquidity to TraderJoe V2

params.firstAmount: amount of the first asset used
params.liquidityMinted: amount of liquidity minted per bin
params.secondAmount: amount of the second asset used
params.user: the address of user providing liquidity

FundedLiquidityTraderJoeV2(address,addre.details: emitted after funding account with TraderJoe V2 LB tokens

params.amounts: The list of amounts to burn of each id in binIds
params.user: the address of user removing liquidity

RemoveLiquidityTraderJoeV2(address,addre.details: emitted after removing liquidity from TraderJoe V2

params.amounts: The list of amounts to burn of each id in binIds
params.user: the address of user removing liquidity

WithdrawnLiquidityTraderJoeV2(address,ad.details: emitted after withdrawing TraderJoe V2 LB tokens

params.amounts: The list of amounts to burn of each id in binIds
params.user: the address of user removing liquidity
